column1: Plan a 7-day family trip for 2 adults and 2 children to Orlando, Florida, from New York (JFK) departing on January 15, 2026. Our budget is $5000. We want to visit Disney World's Magic Kingdom and Universal Studios. Find us a family-friendly hotel with a pool and book our flights.
column2: Should find flights from JFK to MCO, suggest a hotel near the parks, and provide ticket information for both Magic Kingdom and Universal.

column1: We are looking for a 10-day honeymoon package to the Maldives for 2 adults, flying from London (LHR) between November 10-25, 2026. Our budget is $10000. We want an overwater bungalow with all-inclusive meals. Please find flights and hotel options.
column2: Should find flights from LHR to MLE and suggest at least two all-inclusive resorts with overwater bungalows.

column1: I'm a solo backpacker planning a 3-week trip through Southeast Asia, starting from Bangkok, Thailand on February 5, 2026. My budget is $1500. I want to visit Thailand, Vietnam, and Cambodia. Suggest a basic itinerary and some cheap activities.
column2: Should propose a logical route (e.g., BKK -> REP -> SGN), suggest budget-friendly hostels, and mention key activities like Angkor Wat and Ha Long Bay.

column1: I need to book a 4-day business trip for one person to Tokyo, Japan, from San Francisco (SFO). I need to be there for meetings from February 3rd to February 6th, 2026. My budget is $7000. Please book a business class flight and a hotel near the Shinjuku station.
column2: Should find business class flights from SFO to NRT or HND and a hotel in the Shinjuku area for the specified dates.

column1: Four friends want to go on a 5-day ski trip to Zermatt, Switzerland from Munich, Germany, from January 20-25, 2026. Our budget is $4000. We need to find accommodation for 4 people and information on ski pass prices. We will be driving.
column2: Should suggest apartment-style lodging or a chalet for four in Zermatt and provide details on where to find ski pass costs.

column1: Plan a 6-day cultural tour for a couple (2 adults) to Rome and Florence, Italy, flying from Boston (BOS) on January 5, 2026. Our budget is $6000. We want to see the Colosseum in Rome and the Uffizi Gallery in Florence. Find flights, a train between the cities, and hotels.
column2: Should find flights to FCO, suggest a high-speed train from Rome to Florence, and hotels in both cities. Mention booking tickets for attractions in advance.

column1: Two people are looking for a 1-week adventure trip to Costa Rica, flying from Chicago (ORD) anytime in February 2026. Our budget is $3500. We want to go zip-lining in Monteverde and see volcanoes. Find us flights and eco-lodges.
column2: Should find flights to SJO, suggest eco-lodges in the Monteverde or Arenal areas, and provide information on zip-lining tours.

column1: Book a luxury 3-night weekend trip for 2 adults to Dubai from Mumbai (BOM), from January 8-11, 2026. Our budget is $8000. We want a 5-star hotel with a view of the Burj Khalifa and want to do a desert safari activity.
column2: Should find flights from BOM to DXB, a 5-star hotel with the requested view, and a desert safari tour package.

column1: I'm planning a 5-day solo road trip down the California coast from San Francisco to Los Angeles, starting on January 2nd, 2026. Our budget is $2000. Suggest key stops along Highway 1 and find a mid-range hotel in Monterey for one night.
column2: Should recommend stops like Monterey, Big Sur, and Santa Barbara, and find a hotel in Monterey for the night of Sept 2nd.

column1: Find an all-inclusive resort in Cancun, Mexico, for a family of 3 (2 adults, 1 child age 10) for 5 nights. We are flying from Dallas (DFW) on January 20, 2026. Our budget is $4500. The resort must have a kids' club.
column2: Should find flights from DFW to CUN and an all-inclusive resort with a kids' club for the specified dates.

column1: Plan a 10-day historical tour of Egypt for 2 people, flying from Cairo back to Cairo, starting February 10, 2026. Our budget is $7000. We want to see the Pyramids of Giza, and take a Nile cruise from Luxor to Aswan. Find a tour package that includes flights, cruise and a guide.
column2: Should suggest a tour package that includes the Giza Pyramids, a Nile cruise, and guided tours of temples like Karnak and Valley of the Kings.

column1: I want to book a 7-day wildlife safari in the Serengeti, Tanzania for 2 adults. We are flying from Amsterdam (AMS) and want to travel in late January 2026. Our budget is $9000. Find a reputable safari tour operator and suggest a lodge.
column2: Should find flights to Kilimanjaro (JRO) and recommend a safari package for the Serengeti, including a safari lodge or tented camp.

column1: Plan a 4-day trip to see the Northern Lights in Reykjavik, Iceland for 2 people. We're flying from Berlin, Germany, on January 5, 2026. Our budget is $3000. Find us flights, a hotel, and a Northern Lights tour.
column2: Should find flights from BER to KEF, a hotel in Reykjavik, and a guided Northern Lights excursion.

column1: A couple wants a 5-day food and wine tour in Bordeaux, France. We are traveling from London by train from January 16-21, 2026. Our budget is $4000. Suggest a wine tasting tour and find a boutique hotel.
column2: Should provide info on Eurostar/TGV trains to Bordeaux, recommend a specific wine tour (e.g., to Saint-Ã‰milion), and suggest a boutique hotel.

column1: I'm a certified diver and want to go on a 7-day scuba diving trip to the Great Barrier Reef, Australia, for 1 person. I will be starting from Cairns on February 10, 2026. My budget is $5000. Find me a liveaboard boat trip.
column2: Should recommend a liveaboard diving excursion departing from Cairns for the specified dates and diver certification level.

column1: Plan a romantic 4-day anniversary trip to Paris, France for 2 adults. We are flying from Dublin (DUB) on Valentine's day, February 14, 2026. Our budget is $5500. We want a hotel with a view of the Eiffel Tower and a dinner cruise on the Seine.
column2: Should find flights from DUB to CDG, a hotel with an Eiffel Tower view, and a Seine dinner cruise activity.

column1: Two students are looking for a budget-friendly 5-day trip to Lisbon, Portugal from Paris (ORY) from January 25-30, 2026. Our total budget is 800 euros for everything. Find cheap flights and a hostel. Suggest free activities.
column2: Should find low-cost flights from ORY to LIS, a well-rated hostel, and suggest free activities like exploring Alfama or visiting a miradouro.

column1: We are 2 adults who want to see the cherry blossoms in Kyoto, Japan. Plan a 6-day trip from Seoul (ICN) during the first week of February 2026. Our budget is $6000. Find us flights and a traditional ryokan (inn).
column2: Should find flights from ICN to KIX, suggest a ryokan in Kyoto for early April, and mention that it's peak season.

column1: I want to explore ancient ruins in Peru for 12 days as a solo traveler. I'm flying into Cusco from Miami (MIA) on January 1, 2026. My budget is $4000. My main goal is to hike the Inca Trail to Machu Picchu. Please find a guided trek and suggest hotels in Cusco for before and after.
column2: Should find an Inca Trail tour package for early June and recommend hotels in Cusco for acclimatization and post-trek rest.

column1: Plan a 3-day trip for 2 people to New York City from Toronto (YYZ) to see a Broadway show. We want to travel from January 25-28, 2026. Our budget is $2500. Find flights, a hotel near Times Square, and provide options for booking a popular show like 'Wicked' or 'The Lion King'.
column2: Should find flights from YYZ to a NYC airport, a hotel in the Times Square area, and give advice on how to book Broadway tickets.
